mapper.select: select count(*) from mm_report where user_num is not null and event_num is null
select count(*) from mm_report where user_num is null and event_num is not null

select report_num, reporter_id, mm_user.user_id, mm_report.user_num, report_content, report_date,report_ck from mm_report inner join mm_user on mm_report.user_num=mm_user.user_num order by report_date desc

select report_num, reporter_id, report_content, mm_report.event_num, mm_event.event_title, report_date, mm_event.user_num,report_ck from mm_report inner join MM_EVENT on mm_report.event_num=mm_event.event_num order by report_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into mm_notice values ((select nvl(max(notice_num),0)+1 from MM_NOTICE), #{user_num}, '경고', '회원님은 적절하지 않은 게시물을 등록하였습니다. 확인 후 삭제 조치 바랍니다.',sysdate,0)

insert into mm_notice values ((select nvl(max(notice_num),0)+1 from MM_NOTICE), (select user_num from mm_event where event_num=#{event_num}), '경고', '회원님은 적절하지 않은 이벤트를 등록하였습니다. 확인 후 삭제 조치 바랍니다.',sysdate,0)
